title: Authors and Citation
text: Jasen Finch. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Finch J (2023). metaboMisc: Miscellaneous Functions Metabolomics Analyses. R package version 0.6.1, https://jasenfinch.github.io/metaboMisc/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {metaboMisc: Miscellaneous Functions for Metabolomics Analyses},   author = {Jasen Finch},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.6.1},   url = {https://jasenfinch.github.io/metaboMisc/}, }

title: Miscellaneous Functions for Metabolomics Analyses
text: Miscellaneous Functions Metabolomics Analyses collection miscellaneous helper linker functions metabolomics analyses hrm R package ecosystem.

title: Miscellaneous Functions for Metabolomics Analyses
text: metaboMisc package can installed GitHub using following:
code: remotes::install_github('jasenfinch/metaboMisc')

title: Miscellaneous Functions for Metabolomics Analyses
text: package documentation can browsed online https://jasenfinch.github.io/metaboMisc/. believe ’ve found bug metaboMisc, please file bug (, possible, reproducible example) https://github.com/jasenfinch/metaboMisc/issues.

title: Add molecular formula assignments — addAssignments
text: Add molecular formula assignments Analysis S4 class object.

title: Add molecular formula assignments — addAssignments
code: addAssignments(analysis, assignment)  # S4 method for Analysis,Assignment addAssignments(analysis, assignment)

title: Add molecular formula assignments — addAssignments
text: analysis object S4 class Analysis assignment object S4 class Assignment includes assignemnts m/z features specified argument analysis

title: Add molecular formula assignments — addAssignments
text: object S4 class Analysis includes molecular formulas feature names pre-treated data.

title: Convert .raw file header information — convertSampleInfo
text: Convert .raw file header information either grover::sampleInfo(), grover::runInfo() rawrrr::readFileHeader() sample information format compatible binneR profilePro.

title: Convert .raw file header information — convertSampleInfo
code: convertSampleInfo(   sample_info,   gzip_ext = TRUE,   user_text = c("batch", "block", "class", "rawFileOrder", "sampleOrder") )

title: Convert .raw file header information — convertSampleInfo
text: sample_info tibble containing sample information returned either grover::sampleInfo(), grover::runInfo() rawrrr::readFileHeader() gzip_ext add .gz extension returned mzML file names user_text column names five User text columns

title: Convert .raw file header information — convertSampleInfo
text: tibble containing converted sample information.

title: Convert .raw file header information — convertSampleInfo
code: ## Read the file header information from an example .raw file in the  ## grover package available from <https://jasenfinch.github.io/grover/> sample_information <- system.file(     'repository/Thermo-Exactive/Experiment_1/QC01.raw',     package = 'grover') %>%      rawrr::readFileHeader() %>%      tibble::as_tibble()  ## Convert the header information converted_sample_info <- convertSampleInfo(     sample_information,     user_text = c('batch','block','name','class','rawFileOrder'))  converted_sample_info #> # A tibble: 2 × 8 #>   fileOrder injOrder fileName     name  batch block class rawFileOrder #>       <int>    <int> <chr>        <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>        #> 1         1        1 QC01.mzML.gz QC01  1     0     QC    6            #> 2         2        2 QC01.mzML.gz QC01  1     0     QC    6

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
text: Detect batch/block differences within analytical runs ionisation mode.

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
code: detectBatchDiff(x, by = "block", pthresh = 0.05)  # S4 method for Binalysis detectBatchDiff(x, by = "block", pthresh = 0.05)  # S4 method for MetaboProfile detectBatchDiff(x, by = "block", pthresh = 0.05)

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
text: x object S4 class Binalysis MetaboProfile info class column use batch/block information pthresh p-value threshold significance

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
text: differences batches found NULL returned. significant differences found tibble returned containing ANOVA results ionisation mode showing whether batch correction needed.

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
text: Analysis Variance (ANOVA) used detect differences total ion count (TIC) averages batches/blocks.

title: Detect batch/block differences — detectBatchDiff
code: ## Retrieve file paths and sample information for example data files <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes',ask = FALSE) #> FIE-HRMS BdistachyonEcotypes #> size: 56.5M  info <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')  ## Perform spectral binning analysis <- binneR::binneRlyse(files,                                 info,                                 parameters = binneR::detectParameters(files)) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘purrr’ #> The following object is masked from ‘package:metaboMisc’: #>  #>     reduce #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:20:19 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:13  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [44.3S]  ## Detect batch differences batch_diff <- detectBatchDiff(analysis)  ## Display batch differences batch_diff #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   Mode      F `num df` `denom df` `p-value` `Correction needed` #>   <chr> <dbl>    <dbl>      <dbl>     <dbl> <lgl>               #> 1 n      22.7        5       28.8  3.52e- 9 TRUE                #> 2 p     197.         5       28.1  5.73e-21 TRUE

title: Detect miss injections — detectMissInjections
text: Detect miss injected samples samples total ion count percentage threshold median.

title: Detect miss injections — detectMissInjections
code: detectMissInjections(x, idx = "injOrder", threshold = 25)  # S4 method for Binalysis detectMissInjections(x, idx = "injOrder", threshold = 25)  # S4 method for MetaboProfile detectMissInjections(x, idx = "injOrder", threshold = 25)

title: Detect miss injections — detectMissInjections
text: x object S4 class Binalysis MetaboProfile idx sample information column use sample indexes threshold percentage median TIC samples considered miss injections.

title: Detect miss injections — detectMissInjections
text: list containing name sample information column used index miss injections vector miss injection indexes.

title: Detect miss injections — detectMissInjections
code: ## Retrieve file paths and sample information for example data files <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2]  info <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2,]  ## Perform spectral binning analysis <- binneR::binneRlyse(files,                                 info,                                 parameters = binneR::detectParameters(files)) #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:21:05 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:14  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [1.7S]  ## Detect miss injections miss_injections <- detectMissInjections(analysis)  ## Display detected miss injections miss_injections #> $idx #> [1] "injOrder" #>  #> $missInjections #> numeric(0) #>

title: Detect modelling parameters — detectModellingParameters
text: Detect suitable modelling parameters Binalysis, MetaboProfile Analysis S4 classes.

title: Detect modelling parameters — detectModellingParameters
code: detectModellingParameters(x, ...)  # S4 method for Binalysis detectModellingParameters(x)  # S4 method for MetaboProfile detectModellingParameters(x)  # S4 method for Analysis detectModellingParameters(x, type = "pre-treated", cls = "class")

title: Detect modelling parameters — detectModellingParameters
text: x object S4 class Binalysis,MetaboProfile Analysis ... arguments pass appropriate method type detect modelling parameters raw pre-treated data Analysis S4 class cls sample information column use response modelling

title: Detect modelling parameters — detectModellingParameters
text: object S4 class AnalysisParameters

title: Detect modelling parameters — detectModellingParameters
code: ## Retrieve file paths and sample information for example data files <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')  info <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')  ## Perform spectral binning analysis <- binneR::binneRlyse(files,                                 info,                                 parameters = binneR::detectParameters(files)) #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:21:22 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:13  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [42.6S]  ## Detect modelling parameters modelling_parameters <- detectModellingParameters(analysis)  modelling_parameters #> Parameters: #> modelling #> 	randomForest #> 		cls = class #> 		rf = list() #> 		reps = 10 #> 		binary = FALSE #> 		comparisons = list() #> 		perm = 0 #> 		returnModels = FALSE #> 		seed = 1234 #>

title: Detect pre-treatment parameters — detectPretreatmentParameters
text: Detect suitable pre-treatment parameters Binalysis MetaboProfile class objects.

title: Detect pre-treatment parameters — detectPretreatmentParameters
code: detectPretreatmentParameters(   x,   cls = "class",   QCidx = "QC",   miss_injections = TRUE,   batch_correction = TRUE,   threshold = 25 )  # S4 method for Binalysis detectPretreatmentParameters(   x,   cls = "class",   QCidx = "QC",   miss_injections = TRUE,   batch_correction = TRUE,   threshold = 25 )  # S4 method for MetaboProfile detectPretreatmentParameters(   x,   cls = "class",   QCidx = "QC",   miss_injections = TRUE,   batch_correction = TRUE,   threshold = 25 )

title: Detect pre-treatment parameters — detectPretreatmentParameters
text: x S4 object class Binalysis, MetaboProfile AnalysisData cls name  sample information table column containing sample class information QCidx QC sample class label miss_injections TRUE/FALSE. Detect presence possible miss injections include parameters remove necessary. batch_correction TRUE/FALSE. Detect batch correction necessary include parameters perform necessary. threshold percentage median TIC samples considered miss injections. ignored miss_injections = FALSE.

title: Detect pre-treatment parameters — detectPretreatmentParameters
text: object S4 class AnalysisParameters

title: Detect pre-treatment parameters — detectPretreatmentParameters
code: ## Retreive example file paths and sample information  file_paths <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')   sample_information <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')   ## Detect spectral binning parameters bp <- binneR::detectParameters(file_paths)  ## Perform spectral binning bd <- binneR::binneRlyse(file_paths,sample_information,bp) #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:22:19 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:13  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [41.7S]  ## Detect pre-treatment parameters pp <- detectPretreatmentParameters(bd)   pp #> Parameters: #> pre-treatment #> 	correction #> 		center #> 			block = block #> 			type = median #> 	QC #> 		occupancyFilter #> 			cls = class #> 			QCidx = QC #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 		impute #> 			cls = class #> 			QCidx = QC #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 			parallel = variables #> 			seed = 1234 #> 		RSDfilter #> 			cls = class #> 			QCidx = QC #> 			RSDthresh = 50 #> 		removeQC #> 			cls = class #> 			QCidx = QC #> 	occupancyFilter #> 		maximum #> 			cls = class #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 	impute #> 		class #> 			cls = class #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 			seed = 1234 #> 	transform #> 		TICnorm #>

title: Export results — exportData
text: Export data tables Binalysis,MetaboProfile, Analysis Assignment classes.

title: Export results — exportData
code: exportData(x, outPath = ".", ...)  # S4 method for Binalysis exportData(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for MetaboProfile exportData(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportData(x, outPath = ".", type = "raw", idx = "name")  # S4 method for Assignment exportData(x, outPath = ".")  exportSampleInfo(x, outPath = ".", ...)  # S4 method for Binalysis exportSampleInfo(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for MetaboProfile exportSampleInfo(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportSampleInfo(x, outPath = ".", type = "raw")  exportAccurateData(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Binalysis exportAccurateData(x, outPath = ".")  exportPeakInfo(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for MetaboProfile exportPeakInfo(x, outPath = ".")  exportModellingMetrics(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportModellingMetrics(x, outPath = ".")  exportModellingImportance(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportModellingImportance(x, outPath = ".")  exportModelling(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportModelling(x, outPath = ".")  exportCorrelations(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis exportCorrelations(x, outPath = ".")  exportAssignments(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Assignment exportAssignments(x, outPath = ".")  exportSummarisedAssignments(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Assignment exportSummarisedAssignments(x, outPath = ".")  exportConstruction(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Construction exportConstruction(x, outPath = ".")  exportSummarisedConstruction(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Construction exportSummarisedConstruction(x, outPath = ".")  export(x, outPath = ".", ...)  # S4 method for Binalysis export(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for MetaboProfile export(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Analysis export(x, outPath = ".", type = "raw", idx = "name")  # S4 method for Assignment export(x, outPath = ".")  # S4 method for Construction export(x, outPath = ".")

title: Export results — exportData
text: x S4 object class Binalysis, MetaboProfile, Analysis Assignment, outPath directory path export . ... arguments pass relevant method type data type extract. raw pre-treated idx sample information column name use sample IDs

title: Export results — exportData
text: character vector exported file paths.

title: Export results — exportData
code: ## Retrieve file paths and sample information for example data files <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2]  info <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2,]  ## Perform spectral binning analysis <- binneR::binneRlyse(files,                                 info,                                 parameters = binneR::detectParameters(files)) #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:23:01 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:14  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [1.6S]  ## Export spectrally binned data export(analysis,outPath = tempdir()) #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/sample_information.csv"           #> [2] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/accurate_data.csv"                #> [3] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/negative_mode_processed_data.csv" #> [4] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/positive_mode_processed_data.csv"  ## Perform data pre-treatment and modelling p <- metabolyseR::analysisParameters(c('pre-treatment','modelling')) metabolyseR::parameters(p,'pre-treatment') <- metabolyseR::preTreatmentParameters(    list(occupancyFilter = 'maximum',         transform = 'TICnorm') ) metabolyseR::parameters(p,'modelling') <- metabolyseR::modellingParameters('anova') metabolyseR::changeParameter(p,'cls') <- 'day' analysis <- metabolyseR::metabolyse(metaboData::abr1$neg[,1:200],                       metaboData::abr1$fact,                       p) #>  #> metabolyseR  v0.15.0 Wed Mar  8 18:23:03 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Parameters: #> pre-treatment #> 	occupancyFilter #> 		maximum #> 			cls = day #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 	transform #> 		TICnorm #>  #> modelling #> 	anova #> 		cls = day #> 		pAdjust = bonferroni #> 		comparisons = list() #> 		returnModels = FALSE #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Pre-treatment … #>  Pre-treatment 	✔ [0.6S] #> Modelling … #>  Modelling 	✔ [0.5S] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #>  #> Complete! [1.2S]                        ## Export pre-treated data and modelling results export(analysis,outPath = tempdir()) #> All objects contained within supplied list that are not of class RandomForest will be ignored. #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/raw_sample_information.csv"       #> [2] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/raw_data.csv"                     #> [3] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/modelling_importance_metrics.csv"  ## Perform molecular formula assignment future::plan(future::sequential) p <- assignments::assignmentParameters('FIE-HRMS') assignments <- assignments::assignMFs(assignments::feature_data,p) #>  #> assignments v1.0.0 Wed Mar  8 18:23:05 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Assignment Parameters:  #>  #> 	 Technique:		 FIE-HRMS  #> 	 Max M:			 800  #> 	 MF rank threshold:	 3  #> 	 PPM threshold:		 6  #> 	 Relationship limit:	 0.001  #> 	 RT limit:		   #> 	 Correlations: #> 		method: spearman #>  		pAdjustMethod: bonferroni #>  		corPvalue: 0.05 #>  		minCoef: 0.7 #>  		maxCor: Inf #>  #> 	 Adducts:  #> 	 n: [M-H]1-, [M+Cl]1-, [M+K-2H]1-, [M-2H]2-, [M+Cl37]1-, [2M-H]1- #> 	 p: [M+H]1+, [M+K]1+, [M+Na]1+, [M+K41]1+, [M+2H]2+, [2M+H]1+  #> 	 Isotopes: 13C, 18O, 13C2  #> 	 Transformations: M - [O] + [NH2], M - [OH] + [NH2], M + [H2], M - [H2] + [O], M - [H] + [CH3], M - [H] + [NH2], M - [H] + [OH], M + [H2O], M - [H3] + [H2O], M - [H] + [CHO2], M - [H] + [SO3], M - [H] + [PO3H2] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> No. m/z:	10 #> Calculating correlations … #> Calculating correlations 	✔ [10 correlations] [1S] #> Calculating relationships … #> Calculating relationships 	✔ [2.3S] #> Adduct & isotopic assignment … #> generating molecular formulas… #> generating molecular formulas	✔ [40.1S] #> iteration 1… #> iteration 1			✔ [1S] #> iteration 2… #> Adduct & isotopic assignment 	✔ [42.7S] #> Transformation assignment… #> iteration 1 … #> iteration 1 			✔ [2.3S] #> iteration 2 … #> Transformation assignment 	✔ [2.4S] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #>  #> Complete! [50.6S]  ## Export molecular formula assignment results export(assignments,outPath = tempdir()) #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/assignments.csv"            #> [2] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/assigned_data.csv"          #> [3] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/summarised_assignments.csv"  ## Perform consensus structural classification structural_classifications <- construction::construction(assignments) #> Created construction library at /tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/construction_library #> 2 MFs to retrieve out of 2 #>   #> 1. (50%)  #> C6H8O7 #> Searching KEGG... #> 14 hits returned #> Retrieving classifications for 14 InChIKeys... #> ✔ KRKNYBCHXYNGOX-UHFFFAOYSA-N #> ✔ ODBLHEXUDAPZAU-UHFFFAOYSA-N #> ✔ ODBLHEXUDAPZAU-ZAFYKAAXSA-N #> ✔ QUURPCHWPQNNGL-ZAFYKAAXSA-N #> ✔ RXMWXENJQAINCC-DMTCNVIQSA-N #> ✔ CIOXZGOUEYHNBF-UHFFFAOYSA-N #> ✔ QUURPCHWPQNNGL-OKKQSCSOSA-N #> ✔ GJQWCDSAOUMKSE-STHAYSLISA-N #> ✔ ODBLHEXUDAPZAU-OKKQSCSOSA-N #> ✔ YLKFQNUGXOLRNI-KXMYSMCESA-N #> ✔ YLKFQNUGXOLRNI-QDQPNEQZSA-N #> ✔ XECPAIJNBXCOBO-LKELSTGYSA-N #> ✔ QUURPCHWPQNNGL-FONMRSAGSA-N #> ✔ XECPAIJNBXCOBO-MMPJQOAZSA-N #> 14 classifications returned #> Exporting to /tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/construction_library #>   #> 2. (100%)  #> C6H9NO7 #> Searching KEGG... #> 0 hits returned #> Exporting to /tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/construction_library #>  #> Complete!  ## Export consensus structural classification results export(structural_classifications,outPath = tempdir()) #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/consensus_structural_classifications.csv"            #> [2] "/tmp/RtmpDWMOJx/summarised_consensus_structural_classifications.csv"

code: preTreatModes(processed_data, parameters, verbose = TRUE)  # S4 method for Binalysis preTreatModes(processed_data, parameters, verbose = TRUE)  # S4 method for MetaboProfile preTreatModes(processed_data, parameters, verbose = TRUE)

text: processed_data object S4 class Binalysis MetaboProfile parameters object S4 class AnalysisParameters containing pre-treatment parameters verbose print console output

title: Pre-treatment of multiple ionisation modes — preTreatModes
code: ## Retrieve file paths and sample information for example data files <- metaboData::filePaths('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2]  info <- metaboData::runinfo('FIE-HRMS','BdistachyonEcotypes')[1:2,]  ## Detect spectral binning parameters bp <- binneR::detectParameters(files)  ## Perform spectral binning analysis <- binneR::binneRlyse(files,                                 info,                                 parameters = bp) #> binneR v2.6.3 Wed Mar  8 18:24:39 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Scans: 5:14  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Reading raw data #> Gathering bins #> Removing single scan events #> Averaging intensities across scans #> Calculating bin metrics #> Calculating accurate m/z #> Building intensity matrix #> Gathering file headers #>  #> Completed! [1.6S]  ## Dectect the pre-treatment parameters pre_treatment_parameters <- detectPretreatmentParameters(analysis) #> Batches with < 3 replicates removed: "3", "5" #> Only 1 batch detected, skipping detection metabolyseR::changeParameter(pre_treatment_parameters,'parallel') <- 'no'  ## Perform pre-treatment pre_treated_data <- preTreatModes(analysis,                                   pre_treatment_parameters) #>  #> metabolyseR v0.15.0 Wed Mar  8 18:24:41 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Parameters: #> pre-treatment #> 	occupancyFilter #> 		maximum #> 			cls = class #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 	impute #> 		class #> 			cls = class #> 			occupancy = 2/3 #> 			seed = 1234 #> 	transform #> 		TICnorm #>  #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #>  #> Negative mode… Negative mode 		✔ [0.6S] #> Positive mode… Positive mode 		✔ [0.7S] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #>  #> Complete! what: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
text: Reduce m/z features analysis includes putative molecular formula assignments removing isotopic, adduct unknown features.

title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
code: reduce(   x,   isotopes = TRUE,   adducts = TRUE,   unknowns = FALSE,   isotopic_adducts = c("[M+Cl37]1-", "[M+K41]1+") )  # S4 method for Analysis reduce(   x,   isotopes = TRUE,   adducts = TRUE,   unknowns = FALSE,   isotopic_adducts = c("[M+Cl37]1-", "[M+K41]1+") )  # S4 method for AnalysisData reduce(   x,   isotopes = TRUE,   adducts = TRUE,   unknowns = FALSE,   isotopic_adducts = c("[M+Cl37]1-", "[M+K41]1+") )

title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
text: x object S4 class Analysis AnalysisData isotopes TRUE/FALSE remove isotopic features. adducts TRUE/FALSE remove features multiple adducts molecular formula. adduct highest intensity retained assigned molecular formula. unknowns TRUE/FALSE remove unaOssigned m/z features. isotopic_adducts vector additional isotopic adducts remove argument isotopes = TRUE

title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
text: object S4 class Analysis AnalysisData reduced m/z features.

title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
text: argument isotopes = TRUE, isotopic features removed. argument adducts = TRUE, feature maximum intensity molecular formula retained.

title: Reduce an m/z features by removing isotopic, adduct or unknown features — reduce
code: ## Assign molecular formulas p <- assignments::assignmentParameters('FIE')  assignment <- assignments::assignMFs(assignments::feature_data,p) #>  #> assignments v1.0.0 Wed Mar  8 18:24:42 2023 #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> Assignment Parameters:  #>  #> 	 Technique:		 FIE-HRMS  #> 	 Max M:			 800  #> 	 MF rank threshold:	 3  #> 	 PPM threshold:		 6  #> 	 Relationship limit:	 0.001  #> 	 RT limit:		   #> 	 Correlations: #> 		method: spearman #>  		pAdjustMethod: bonferroni #>  		corPvalue: 0.05 #>  		minCoef: 0.7 #>  		maxCor: Inf #>  #> 	 Adducts:  #> 	 n: [M-H]1-, [M+Cl]1-, [M+K-2H]1-, [M-2H]2-, [M+Cl37]1-, [2M-H]1- #> 	 p: [M+H]1+, [M+K]1+, [M+Na]1+, [M+K41]1+, [M+2H]2+, [2M+H]1+  #> 	 Isotopes: 13C, 18O, 13C2  #> 	 Transformations: M - [O] + [NH2], M - [OH] + [NH2], M + [H2], M - [H2] + [O], M - [H] + [CH3], M - [H] + [NH2], M - [H] + [OH], M + [H2O], M - [H3] + [H2O], M - [H] + [CHO2], M - [H] + [SO3], M - [H] + [PO3H2] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #> No. m/z:	10 #> Calculating correlations … #> Calculating correlations 	✔ [10 correlations] [1S] #> Calculating relationships … #> Calculating relationships 	✔ [2.2S] #> Adduct & isotopic assignment … #> generating molecular formulas… #> generating molecular formulas	✔ [40S] #> iteration 1… #> iteration 1			✔ [1S] #> iteration 2… #> Adduct & isotopic assignment 	✔ [42.6S] #> Transformation assignment… #> iteration 1 … #> iteration 1 			✔ [2.3S] #> iteration 2 … #> Transformation assignment 	✔ [2.4S] #> ________________________________________________________________________________ #>  #> Complete! [50.4S]  ## Retrieve assigned data assigned_data <- metabolyseR::analysisData(  assignments::assignedData(assignment),  tibble::tibble(sample = seq_len(nrow(assignments::feature_data)))  )  reduced_data <- metaboMisc::reduce(assigned_data)  reduced_data #>  #> AnalysisData object containing: #>  #> Samples: 60  #> Features: 6  #> Info: 1  #>

title: metaboMisc 0.6.1
text: Fix missing name column tables returned convertSampleInfo().

title: metaboMisc 0.6.0
text: injOrder now default column sample indexes returned detectMissInjections(). returned miss injection indexes now sorted. Fixed MetaboProfile S4 class export() method GC-MS techniques. Added strategy workers arguments suitableParallelPlan() allow manual selection parallel options. Added export() method Construction S4 class. detectModellingParameters() now returns parameters unsupervised random forest single class response specified. Added miss_injections batch_correction arguments detectPretreatmentParameters() specify miss injection detection /batch correction detection performed. RSDthresh parameter now set detectPretreatmentParameters() MetaboProfile S4 class depending technique used. Miss injections now detected percentage threshold median total ion count detectMissInjections(). Added isotopic_adducts argument reduce() allow removal m/z features assigned isotopic adducts. row order output convertSampleInfo() now always match row order input. Added user_text argument convertSampleInfo() denote column names User text fields.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.11
text: exportCSV() now recursively creates destination directory already exist.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.10
text: detectPretreatmentParameters() now fully matches QCidx argument supplied class information detecting presence QC samples.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.9
text: Corrected exported file name mode-less processed data MetaboProfile class. Fixed character sanitation sanitiseTable(). Fixed extraneous console messages detectMissInjections() detectBatchDiff() methods MetaboProfile class. Enabled unit tests methods MetaboProfile class. detectPretreatmentParameters() now detects presence QC samples.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.8
text: Numbers characters strings now limited sanitiseTable().

title: metaboMisc 0.5.7
text: Removed aberHRML/metaboData Remotes field DESCRIPTION ensure CRAN version metaboData installed. Added sanitiseTable() can used restrict number rows table round numeric columns given number significant figures.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.6
text: Fixed missing argument error detectPretreatmentParameters() miss injections detected.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.5
text: Added gzip_ext argument convertSampleInfo() enable addition .gz file extension file names fileNames column.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.4
text: Added exportModelling() method Analysis class.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.3
text: Added generic methods exporting individual elements Binalysis, MetaboProfile, Analysis Assignment classes. export methods now return vectors file paths exported files.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.2
text: Added addAssignments() method Analysis Assignment classes. Added exportCSV() exports data .csv format returns file path exported file. Added convertSampleInfo() convert sample information returned grover::runInfo format compatible binneR profilePro packages.

title: metaboMisc 0.5.1
text: Fixed error detectPretreatmentParameters().

title: metaboMisc 0.5.0
text: Added pkgdown site available . Removed redundant methods functions: detectPairwises(), addAssignments(), filterCorrelations(), theme_neat(). Improved documentation added examples. Added unit testing infrastructure. Added detectPretreatmentParameters detectModellingParameters methods. magrittr pipe (%>%) now re-exported.

title: metaboMisc 0.4.6
text: Fixed parameter handling preTreatModes.

title: metaboMisc 0.4.5
text: Fixed breakages function imports caused metabolyseR version 0.14.0.

title: metaboMisc 0.4.4
text: Fixed binneR::sampleInfo() imports binneR v2.5.0 update.

title: metaboMisc 0.4.3
text: Fixed missing method exports metaboMisc::addAssignments(), metaboMisc::detectBatchDiff(), metaboMisc::detectMissInjections(), metaboMisc::detectPairwises() metaboMisc::reduce().

title: metaboMisc 0.4.2
text: Added metaboMisc::featureSummary() summarise spectral features Binalysis S4 class.

title: metaboMisc 0.4.1
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added metaboMisc::suitableParallelPlan() generate suitable parallel processing future plan.
